title: Real-Time Chatting Website
description: Developed a dynamic and responsive chatting application using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). This project features real-time messaging, user authentication, and a scalable backend, demonstrating my expertise in full-stack development and my ability to create engaging and functional web applications.

title: Shopping App
description: Showcasing advanced API handling skills, this cutting-edge shopping website is built with React and Node.js. Leveraging the power of the eBay API, users can explore a vast array of products with ease. Behind the scenes, a robust Node.js backend efficiently manages data retrieval and processing, ensuring a seamless user experience. The responsive design guarantees optimal performance across devices, making shopping a breeze for every user. Experience the synergy of efficient API integration and intuitive design on this feature-rich platform.

title: Weather App
description: A responsive weather application built using React. This app seamlessly integrates with a weather API to provide real-time weather data for any location. Key features include dynamic weather updates, a user-friendly interface, and adaptability to various screen sizes, ensuring an optimal user experience on both desktop and mobile devices.

title: Tictactoe Game
description: I designed and implemented a simple yet engaging Tic Tac Toe game using the React framework. Despite being new to game development, I successfully created an interactive and responsive gaming experience. This project showcases my ability to learn and apply new technologies effectively, as well as my proficiency in front-end web development with React.

title: Portfolio Page
description: I crafted my own personal portfolio website using React, showcasing my skills, projects, and resume. This project not only serves as a practical platform for displaying my work but also demonstrates my proficiency in front-end web development with React. It reflects my dedication to presenting myself professionally.
